title: The Pen Pal
description: Avionce Griffin was only sixteen years old when he was sentenced to fifty-eight years in prison for first degree murder and after being transferred from a juvenile detention center to an adult male prison not long after his eighteenth birthday, Avionce is exposed to a way of life that he was not prepared for. He later joins the prison's Pen Pal program with the hopes of finding someone who could help him escape the mental anguish he felt from daily prison life as well as the secrets from his past which led to his incarceration.
author: Rayven Skyy
